Reviews.Title: “A hotel worth visiting”
Reviews.Author: RainbowThanet
Reviews.Content: A very comfortable hotel and staff very good. The only criticism is that the bar closes on holidays and it is impossible to get a drink in the hotel otherwise everything is well up to standard.

Reviews.Title: “Honest price”
Reviews.Author: jcoutinho
Reviews.Content: A fair price for a quality, modern, confortable and clean hotel. Excelent staff,

Reviews.Title: “Excellent except for entertainment”
Reviews.Author: mutjack
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel almost every year since it opened. I am pleased with the hotel in general. My only comment is on the television. Although I am of Spanish decent , my Spanish is marginal. Today most Spanish channels offer movies etc in Dual language. Unfortunatly this Hotel does not provide tVs with the capability of Dual language

Reviews.Title: “not in MADRID”
Reviews.Author: wishing101
Reviews.Content: booked this hotel for a 2 night weekend stay in October through Expedia. The hotel itself was fine. Although the bar had closed by midnight on th Saturday. The problem is that its not in MADRID. A taxi ride from the airport was €40. Journey time from the local Metro to the city centre was 1 hour with two track changes. We ended up moving hotels on the Sunday morning as it was just too far from anywhere....................

HotelInfo.Name: AC Hotel Rivas by Marriott
HotelInfo.Address: C/ Francisco Quevedo 2, 28529 Madrid, Spain
